actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act, as amended, to protect the integrity of labor organizations.

summary.text: States that it shall not be an unfair labor practice, under the National Labor Relations Act, for an employer engaged in the food processing industry to make an agreement covering employees engaged in such industry with a labor organization because such agreement requires, as a condition of employment, membership in such labor organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act, as amended, to protect the integrity of labor organizations.
